info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central DeKalb, southeastern Cobb and central Fulton Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 447 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Cascade Heights, or over Atlanta, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, City of South Fulton, Sandy Springs, Smyrna, East Point, Chamblee, Hapeville, North Atlanta, North Druid Hills, Midtown, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Druid Hills, Vinings, Sweet Auburn, Piedmont Park, Cascade Heights, Lakewood Park, Brookhaven, Sandtown, and Little Five Points. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
